subject: BB&T: confirm your identity. [Tue, 10 Apr 2007 10:35:06 -0800]
body: "Behind you!     combinator  coleus       Now I must rinse.He didn't stop hearing the riding mower, but its sound became deeper, rougher, choppier: the sound of the electric knife.  I get the message.      The first twinges of pain slipped down his legs like poisoned water.  And she might stay away eighty this time.      Paul thought: Chug-a-lug, chug-a-lug, make ya want to holler hi-de-ho.       Paul made a mental bet with himself that Bossie would tear in half before Annie got her to the grave, but that one he lost.  It was the face of a woman who has come momentarily untethered from all of the vital positions and landmarks of her life, a woman who has forgotten not only the memory she was in the process of recounting but memory itself.      covary
